name: Neon Hair Dresser
description:
You are playing with your dolly but oh my! Isn't her hair ever so dull?

Lets see if we can't give her a new look with daddy's trimmer!

Instructions

  • Left hand is the trimmer
  • Right hand is just a hand
  • You can also use tool tracking with a pencil or similar object (hand is better)
  • Rotate the dolly by swiping up and down the sides on her left and right
  • R - Restart
  • Escape - Quit

Update

  • Tweaked swiping
  • Added boxes indicating rotation zones
